javadoc.text: A class to test the QuantileBin1D code. * The command line is "java Quantile1Test numExamples N" * where numExamples is the number of random (Gaussian) numbers to * be presented to the QuantileBin1D.add method, and N is * the absolute maximum number of examples the QuantileBin1D is setup * to receive in the constructor. N can be set to "L", which will use * Long.MAX_VALUE, or to "I", which will use Integer.MAX_VALUE, or to * any positive long value.
